name: Military Secret Killer
description:
If you want to play this Military Secret Killer most addictive most popular sniper shooting game then this game is exactly made for you. Today you can enjoy one of the best commando shooting game. You will feel pleasure after play this extreme best action base game.You can also improve your shooting skills by playing this Military Secret Killer game.

Easy to play
Realistic sniper shooting adventure
Stunning HD graphics
Complete action sniper game
It will train you as a professional shooter
